Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item carries a profound value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $850000. We believe this is an opportunity not only to acquire a high-quality product but also to partner with a company committed to excellence and continuous advancement. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
